specificArticles.textContent: In the picture above you can see how the 'Vulcan' massive looks like from the 'Cârnic' peak (Rosia Montana). Perhaps due to eruption of this volcano we have now a rich mineral resources area. To reach it you will have to go from Casa Petri to Gura Rosiei -> Abrud -> Ciuruleasa -> Vulcan. The road is quite spacial because you will go by the 'Abrud' mountains and a pine forest whose smell I'm pretty sure you'll remember long time after. To get to the top of Vulcan, from the asphalted road, you’ll have to go uphill on a unpaved road.

specificArticles.title: Vulcan
specificArticles.textContent: 'Vulcan' is a massive that dominates the surroundings - above all the neighboring mountains, consisting of a forested limestone plateau. It is surrounded almost entirely by high walls (~150m tall) and is a protected area. The walls are a paradise for escalation or climbing, with sticky and solid rocks.'
